name: Sputnik
description: What happens when you cross a space-themed Apollo 13 strain with Black Russian? You get Sputnik, a strain named after the satellite the Soviet Union launched into a quick orbit around the Earth in 1957. Sputnik has an aroma of a sweet fruit with hints of sour and diesel when exhaled.Â Patients typically look to Sputnik for relief of chronic pain, anxiety, and insomnia.
